fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Pardon (Day):** Attempt to cancel a lynch. 1 use.
**Decide Fate (Day):** Immediately kill the player with the most votes. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - When attempting to cancel a lynch, you will force all players voting the person with the most votes to retract those votes; then, prevent the person being voted from being voted again for the rest of the day.
